ViewObject.Name: ApprovalReceiverNewProposalView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW, ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_STEP, ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM, ApprovalFlow.APRVL_CODE, ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME, ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE, ApprovalFlow.STATUS, AppUserAccess.USER_NAME, AppUserAccess.ID FROM APPROVAL_FLOW ApprovalFlow, APPROVAL_STEPS ApprovalSteps, APP_USER_ACCESS AppUserAccess, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES AppUserAccessRoles WHERE ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM = :aprvlFlowNm AND ApprovalFlow.STATUS = 'A' AND AppUserAccessRoles.USER_NAME = AppUserAccess.USER_NAME AND AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE = ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME AND AppUserAccess.USER_NAME = (SELECT AUA.DIRECT_SPV FROM APP_USER_ACCESS AUA WHERE AUA.USER_NAME = :usrName) --AND ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE = (SELECT AST.STEP_SEQUENCE+1 FROM APPROVAL_FLOW AF, APPROVAL_STEPS AST, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES UAR --WHERE AST.ID_APRVL_FLOW = AF.ID_APRVL_FLOW --AND AF.APRVL_FLOW_NM = ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM --AND AST.ROLE_NAME = UAR.ROLE --AND UAR.USER_NAME = :usrName) GROUP BY ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW, ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_STEP, ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM, ApprovalFlow.APRVL_CODE, ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME, ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE, ApprovalFlow.STATUS, AppUserAccess.USER_NAME, AppUserAccess.ID UNION ALL SELECT ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW, ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_STEP, ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM, ApprovalFlow.APRVL_CODE, ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME, MAX(ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE), ApprovalFlow.STATUS, AppUserAccess.USER_NAME, AppUserAccess.ID FROM APPROVAL_FLOW ApprovalFlow, APPROVAL_STEPS ApprovalSteps, APP_USER_ACCESS AppUserAccess, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES AppUserAccessRoles WHERE ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW = ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM = :aprvlFlowNm AND ApprovalFlow.STATUS = 'A' AND AppUserAccessRoles.USER_NAME = AppUserAccess.USER_NAME AND AppUserAccessRoles.ROLE = ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME AND (((SELECT COUNT(AUA.USER_NAME) FROM APP_USER_ACCESS AUA WHERE AUA.USER_NAME = :usrName AND AUA.DIRECT_SPV IS NULL) <> 0) OR (SELECT COUNT(UAC.USER_NAME) FROM APPROVAL_FLOW AFL, APPROVAL_STEPS AST, APP_USER_ACCESS UAC, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES ACR WHERE AFL.ID_APRVL_FLOW = AST.ID_APRVL_FLOW AND AFL.APRVL_FLOW_NM = AFL.APRVL_FLOW_NM AND AFL.STATUS = 'A' AND ACR.USER_NAME = UAC.USER_NAME AND ACR.ROLE = AST.ROLE_NAME AND UAC.USER_NAME = (SELECT AUA.DIRECT_SPV FROM APP_USER_ACCESS AUA WHERE AUA.USER_NAME = :usrName) --AND AST.STEP_SEQUENCE = (SELECT AST.STEP_SEQUENCE+1 FROM APPROVAL_FLOW AF, APPROVAL_STEPS AST, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES UAR --WHERE AST.ID_APRVL_FLOW = AF.ID_APRVL_FLOW --AND AF.APRVL_FLOW_NM = AFL.APRVL_FLOW_NM --AND AST.ROLE_NAME = UAR.ROLE --AND UAR.USER_NAME = :usrName) ) = 0) AND ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE = (SELECT MAX(ASTEP.STEP_SEQUENCE) FROM APPROVAL_FLOW AFLOW, APPROVAL_STEPS ASTEP, APP_USER_ACCESS_ROLES UAR WHERE AFLOW.APRVL_FLOW_NM = ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM AND ASTEP.ID_APRVL_FLOW = AFLOW.ID_APRVL_FLOW ) GROUP BY ApprovalFlow.ID_APRVL_FLOW, ApprovalSteps.ID_APRVL_STEP, ApprovalFlow.APRVL_FLOW_NM, ApprovalFlow.APRVL_CODE, ApprovalSteps.ROLE_NAME, ApprovalSteps.STEP_SEQUENCE, ApprovalFlow.STATUS, AppUserAccess.USER_NAME, AppUserAccess.ID
